TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 913
TEI.2.document_title: Samuel M Williams to E. St John Hawkins, 01-15-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: Samuel M. Williams to E. St. John Hawkins, January 15, 1833. Bill for stamped paper and services.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 913

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Samuel M. Williams to E. St. John Hawkins, January 15, 1833. Bill for stamped paper and services.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr E. St. J Hawkins*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*Samuel M Williams */person_mentioned* Dr.*/p*
*p*To Stamps for Original Deed *person_mentioned* S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* to you 1 st 6 2 sheets each 6 1/4 c______________6.12 1/2*/p*
*p*To do for Copy 1st l.50 for 2 6 1/4 f ea_________ 1. 62 1/2*/p* *p*7.75*/p*
*p*To fees for Writing original and Copy___________ 15.00*/p*
*p*$22. 75*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="01-15-1833">15 January */date_mentioned* Rec payt*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Samuel M Williams*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
